item.title: Not only Big Data
item.description:
Recently I've been at a Cineca workshop focused on tools to deal with big data analysis. We had a taste of MapReduce/Hadoop/Spark and friends and we used Docker. I wrote a small presentation to update my collegues and it become a in-progress presentation of the tools I think are useful in our everyday work. This presentation aims of acting both as a showcase of what can help us and as a cheat sheet. You can find it after the break.

Read moreâ€¦
